task.title: Viewing MIBs by using
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view a list of the Management Information Base (MIB) files by using .

context.p: You can view a list of the MIBs by using , or by using the . For more information about using the to view a list of MIBs, see .
context.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

step.cmd: To view a list of all MIBs on , use the REST API GET method with the following configuration URI:
